price: 31. Oyo ezali na elili te mpe ekoki kobatela moto na motó te!
arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā ẓalīlin walā yugh'nī mina al-lahabi
